'''Alpha v1.0.8''' is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released on July 19, 2010,<ref>[[wordofnotch:833718811|Minecraft Alpha 1.0.8]] – The Word of Notch, July 20, 2010</ref> which added [[cow]]s, [[milk]], and [[leather]]. It also changed the [[crafting]] recipe for leather [[armor]].

== Additions ==
{{Additions table
|Leather
|Milk Bucket}}

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Leather JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Leather]]'''
* Drops when a cow is killed.

'''[[File:Milk Bucket JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Milk Bucket]]'''
* Currently unobtainable.
* Has no function.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Cow JE1.png|32px]] [[Cow]]s'''
* Drop 0–2 leather upon [[death]].
* Has {{hp|10}}.
